name: 邱弘緯
objective: This course teaches the analysis and design of mixed-signal ICs. This course focus on the analysis of signal conversion and system modeling. Material covered will integrate the four key facets MLDS to analyze and design an intelligent MX circuit. (1) Modeling - building MX circuit  (2) Language - utilizatin of verilog-A, verilog-D, Python, C or Matlab(3) Data - characterization of the circuit performance (4) System - adaptive algorithm for optimization. The example circuits comprises voltage regulator, PLL and SAR ADC.
schedule:
Week1-3 : Theory of closed loop system
Week4-5 : Matlab Modeling for PLL
Week6-7 : Verilog-A Modeling for PLL
Week8-9 : Verilog-D Simulation for PLL
Week10 : Synthesis 
Week11-12 : Mixed-Signal Simulation
Week13 : Mid-term project
Week14-15  : Theory of SAR ADC 
Week16-17  : Analysis and design of SAR ADC 
Week18 : Final Project
scorePolicy:
Homework assignments : 40%
Mid-term project : 30%
Final project : 30%
materials:
1.CMOS Analog Circuit Design , Allen
2.CMOS Mixed-Signal Circuit Design , R.Jacob Baker
